channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for VT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for VT

item.title: Report E-2024030444
item.description:
Report E-2024030444

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-25T15:12:33+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-04
  • City: BERLIN
  • State: VT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDEX FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0

  • Description: Associate punctured freight with forklift blades while loading / unloading causing product to leak

item.title: Report E-2024030295
item.description:
Report E-2024030295

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-20T15:11:12+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-16
  • City: WILLISTON
  • State: VT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: A. DUIE PYLE INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: While loading freight into a trailer, forklift operator struck a tote that was already staged in the trailer with the forkblade of their forklift they were operating that was sticking out beyond the pallet they were transporting. Immediate control, containment and confinement defensive actions were taken by deploying boom and absorbents materials and an outside spill response company was retained for cleanup. The county hazmat team also responded in efforts to help contain and confine until the response company arrived onsite.
